articles.description: A much-changed Doncaster Rovers side came from behind to beat Lincoln City 2-1 in the Papa Johns Trophy.
articles.content: Rovers, who made nine changes from Saturdays 1-0 loss to Swindon Town, rekindled their useful habit of scoring late goals when Adam Long got the final touch to send the ball over the line for the win… [+1132 chars]

articles.author: Liam Keen
articles.title: EFL Trophy: Stockport 1 Wolves 2 - Report - Express & Star
articles.description: Wolves under-21s secured their place in the knockout stages of the Papa Johns Trophy with a 2-1 win away at League Two Stockport.
articles.content: The hosts made a good start with the first two chances falling to Paddy Madden. First, the striker met a cross and volleyed into the ground, which goalkeeper Jackson Smith claimed, before shortly aft… [+2661 chars]

articles.author: Adam Shergold
articles.title: Russia is BANNED from Euro 2024 as UEFA kick them out of qualifying over Ukraine invasion - Daily Mail
articles.description: The country has been suspended from UEFA and FIFA competitions since Vladimir Putin's military launched its invasion of Ukraine in February.
articles.content:
Russia will be banned from Euro 2024 as the country's isolation from international sport continues over the war in Ukraine.
The country has been suspended from UEFA and FIFA competitions since Vladi… [+2856 chars]

articles.author: Liverpool FC
articles.title: Sir Kenny Dalglish’s legends game preview: ‘Everybody just loves getting back together’ - Liverpool FC
articles.description: Sir Kenny Dalglish can't wait to reunite with friends old and new when he manages Liverpool FC Legends again at Anfield this weekend.
articles.content:
How long have you been thinking about your team selection, do you know your starting XI already? 
If they're good enough to turn up, we deserve to give them a reasonable amount of time on the pitch,… [+1572 chars]
